work with us page.collaboration: Depending upon your company’s needs, Evologic offers various collaboration opportunities. Whether you’re looking to collaborate on manufacturing, formulation, or even getting in touch with potential distribution partners, we have a solution to meet your needs. We are always interested in combining leading expertise in a given field, bringing together expertise in one competitive value chain.
work with us page.fee: Is your development already well-advanced but you are missing the puzzle piece to complete your project? Evologic offers a fee for service model for all contract manufacturing (MAKE) and contract development (SOLVE) activities. As a customer you retain full control and rights over the generated IP.
work with us page.ip sharing: Our cooperative projects offer economical access to our services and technologies. Opportunities and risks are shared between all collaborating partners. Depending upon the level of strategic fit, we are open to joint product development programs, grant applications, or simple proof of concept studies. Let's combine our expertise to set new standards for science-based biologicals.

ip sharing page.title: Work with Us
ip sharing page.content: Evologic offers excellence in manufacturing and formulation technologies. So, if you have a microbial organism you want to bring to market – lets get in touch and make this work. However we do prefer a challenge.

fee page.title: Grow Different
fee page.content: The fungal kingdom is Evologic’s  secret passion when it comes to favorite organisms. However, we offer more – our capabilities span growing transformed plants (without leaves) in bioreactors to growing and formulating challenging bacteria with an impressing productivity.
